term.title: quantum

item.text: An elementary particle of electromagnetic energy in the sense of the wave-particle duality.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 2223. 'Glossary of terms used in photochemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 2267 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668122223)
